Mode.name: ALT
Mode.Description: Altitude Hold (ALT) maintains the aircraft at the selected altitude after altitude capture is complete or when the autopilot is engaged while the aircraft is level.
Mode.Activation: Automatically activated after ALT* completes altitude capture, or when the autopilot is engaged while the aircraft is in level flight.
Mode.Behavior: The aircraft maintains the selected altitude using pitch adjustments. Vertical speed is commanded to zero. The mode remains active until the pilot selects a new vertical mode or changes the selected altitude.
